Kit Kat crash fix

App is good.  If the app is crashing for you in kit kat do the following:  Go to android settings -> "more" under wireless & networks -> mobile networks -> access point names -> choose the preselected button (likely T-Mobile GPRS) -> APN Protocol -> Switch it to IPv4/IPv6.  Basically TMobile is IPV6 only for certain devices (nexus 5, note 3) and Vonage uses IPv4. This will fix the issue.
